mapper.select: SELECT A.REQEST_SEQNO ,B.EXPRIEM_SEQNO ,B.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO ,C.EXPRIEM_NM ,D.EXPR_ODR ,D.QC_RESULT_VALUE ,B.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO||D.EXPR_ODR AS SEQ_COUNT FROM IM_REQEST A LEFT JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM B ON A.REQEST_SEQNO = B.REQEST_SEQNO LEFT JOIN SY_EXPRIEM C ON B.EXPRIEM_SEQNO = C.EXPRIEM_SEQNO LEFT JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT D ON B.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = D.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO WHERE A.BPLC_CODE = AND A.REQEST_SEQNO= #{reqestSeqno} AND D.JDGMNT_WORD_CODE = 'IM05000002' ORDER BY EXPRIEM_SEQNO,EXPR_ODR

SELECT A.NCR_SEQNO ,A.ORDR ,A.LAST_CHANGER_ID ,A.LAST_CHANGE_DT ,A.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO ,C.EXPRIEM_NM ,D.EXPR_ODR ,D.QC_RESULT_VALUE ,B.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO||D.EXPR_ODR AS SEQ_COUNT FROM RS_NCR_EXPRIEM A LEFT JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM B ON A.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = B.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO LEFT JOIN SY_EXPRIEM C ON C.EXPRIEM_SEQNO = B.EXPRIEM_SEQNO LEFT JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT D ON A.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = D.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO AND A.EXPR_ODR = D.EXPR_ODR WHERE A.BPLC_CODE = AND A.NCR_SEQNO = #{ncrSeqno} AND A.DELETE_AT='N' ORDER BY REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO, EXPR_ODR
